languages.text: {n}Вультур вздыхает.{/n} "Не все движимы лишь азартом и жаждой наживы, Вольный Торговец. Ваше положение затмило вам разум... прискорбно, но неудивительно — без должной дисциплины в суждениях и поступках это скорее наиболее ожидаемый результат".

{n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."
languages.original_text: {n}Вультур вздыхает.{/n} "Не все движимы лишь азартом и жаждой наживы, Вольный Торговец. Ваше положение затмило вам разум... прискорбно, но неудивительно — без должной дисциплины в суждениях и поступках это скорее наиболее ожидаемый результат".

{n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

{n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

{n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

languages.text: {n}Vultur seufzt.{/n} "Nicht jeder wird von Habgier und Abenteuerlust getrieben, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mir scheint, Eure Position hat Euren Verstand getrübt ... Das ist bedauerlich, aber wenig überraschend ... ohne Disziplin hinsichtlich Eures Urteilsvermögens und Eurer Taten war das zu erwarten."
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur seufzt.{/n} "Nicht jeder wird von Habgier und Abenteuerlust getrieben, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mir scheint, Eure Position hat Euren Verstand getrübt ... Das ist bedauerlich, aber wenig überraschend ... ohne Disziplin hinsichtlich Eures Urteilsvermögens und Eurer Taten war das zu erwarten."

languages.text: {n}Vultur pousse un soupir.{/n} « Nous ne sommes pas tous motivés par la cupidité et les sensations fortes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je constate que votre position vous a embrumé l'esprit... Aussi regrettable que ce soit, c'est inévitable lorsque l'on manque de discipline dans son jugement et dans ses actes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur pousse un soupir.{/n} « Nous ne sommes pas tous motivés par la cupidité et les sensations fortes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je constate que votre position vous a embrumé l'esprit... Aussi regrettable que ce soit, c'est inévitable lorsque l'on manque de discipline dans son jugement et dans ses actes. »

languages.text: {n}沃尔图尔叹了口气。{/n}“并非每个人都受贪婪与刺激驱使，行商浪人。看得出来，你的地位已经蒙蔽了你的心智……虽然这很令人遗憾，但完全不足为奇。若是缺乏应有的判断力、执行力，往往只会落得这样的下场。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

traits.locale_text: {n}沃尔图尔叹了口气。{/n}“并非每个人都受贪婪与刺激驱使，行商浪人。看得出来，你的地位已经蒙蔽了你的心智……虽然这很令人遗憾，但完全不足为奇。若是缺乏应有的判断力、执行力，往往只会落得这样的下场。”

languages.text: {n}Vultur suspira.{/n} «No todo el mundo se deja guiar por la avaricia y la búsqueda de emociones, Comerciante Independiente. Veo que su posición ha nublado su mente... Lamentable, pero no me sorprende. Sin una disciplina adecuada, es el desenlace más probable».
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur suspira.{/n} «No todo el mundo se deja guiar por la avaricia y la búsqueda de emociones, Comerciante Independiente. Veo que su posición ha nublado su mente... Lamentable, pero no me sorprende. Sin una disciplina adecuada, es el desenlace más probable».

languages.text: {n}ヴァルターはため息をつく。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、誰もが貪欲でスリルを求めているわけではないのです。立場というものがあなたの心を曇らせたようですね…遺憾ではありますが、当然のことです。判断と行動に適切な規律がなければ、最も起こりうる結末でしかありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴァルターはため息をつく。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、誰もが貪欲でスリルを求めているわけではないのです。立場というものがあなたの心を曇らせたようですね…遺憾ではありますが、当然のことです。判断と行動に適切な規律がなければ、最も起こりうる結末でしかありません」

languages.text: {n}Vultur iç çekiyor.{/n} "Açgözlülük ve heyecan arayışı, herkesin kamçısı değildir Hür Tacir. Gördüğüm kadarıyla bulunduğunuz makam zihninizi bulandırmış... Çok yazık ancak hiç şaşırtıcı değil. Disiplinden mahrum muhakemenin ve davranışların kaçınılmaz sonu."
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Not everyone is driven by greed and thrill-seeking, Rogue Trader. I see your position has clouded your mind... Regrettable, but unsurprising — without due discipline in judgement and actions, it is only the most likely terminus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur iç çekiyor.{/n} "Açgözlülük ve heyecan arayışı herkesin kamçısı değildir Hür Tacir. Gördüğüm kadarıyla bulunduğunuz makam zihninizi bulandırmış... Çok yazık ancak hiç şaşırtıcı değil. Disiplinden mahrum muhakeme ve davranışların kaçınılmaz sonu."
